instruction: Create a Blueprint with a string variable PlayerName set to Hero. On BeginPlay print Welcome followed by the player name.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_WelcomeName
PARENT: Actor
VAR PlayerName: String = "Hero"
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=PlayerName]
NODE n3: Concatenate [A="Welcome "]
NODE n4: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.B [String]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.InString [String]
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_WelcomePlayer
PARENT: Actor
VAR PlayerName: String = "Hero"
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=PlayerName]
NODE n3: Concatenate [A="Welcome ", B=Unknown]
NODE n4: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.InString [String]>
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_WelcomePlayer
PARENT: Actor
VAR PlayerName: String = "Hero"
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=PlayerName]
NODE n3: Concatenate [A="Welcome ", B=Unknown]
NODE n4: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.InString [String]>

instruction: Create a Blueprint with an integer variable Score at 0. On overlap add 10 to Score and print Score: followed by the value.

PARENT: Actor

GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Score]
NODE n3: AddInt [B=10]
NODE n4: VariableSet [VarName=Score]
NODE n5: Concatenate [A="Score: "]

DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Value [Int]
EXEC n4.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n5.B [String]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.InString [String]

instruction: Create a Blueprint with float Health at 100. On AnyDamage subtract damage, print Health: followed by the new value.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_HealthDisplay
PARENT: Actor
VAR Health: Float = 100.0
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_AnyDamage
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Health]
NODE n3: SubtractFloat
NODE n4: VariableSet [VarName=Health]
NODE n5: Concatenate [A="Health: "]
NODE n6: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.A [Float]
DATA n1.Damage -> n3.B [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Value [Float]
EXEC n4.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n5.B [String]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.InString [String]
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_Damageable
PARENT: Actor
VAR Health: Float = 100
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_AnyDamage
NODE n2: GetVar [Variable=Health]
NODE n3: SubtractFloat
NODE n4: SetVar [Variable=Health]
NODE n5: Concatenate [A="Health: "]
NODE n6: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.A [Float]
DATA n1.Damage -> n3.B [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Value [Float]
EXEC n4.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n5.B [String]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.InString [String] }
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_Damageable
PARENT: Actor
VAR Health: Float = 100
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_AnyDamage
NODE n2: GetVar [Variable=Health]
NODE n3: SubtractFloat
NODE n4: SetVar [Variable=Health]
NODE n5: Concatenate [A="Health: "]
NODE n6: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.A [Float]
DATA n1.Damage -> n3.B [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Value [Float]
EXEC n4.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n5.B [String]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.InString [String] }

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on Tick gets actor location, breaks it into components, and prints the vector as a string.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_LocationDebug
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: GetActorLocation
NODE n3: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.InString [String]
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_PrintVector
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
VAR VectorString: String = ""
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: GetActorLocation
NODE n3: BreakVector
NODE n4: Concatenate
NODE n5: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.X [Float]
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.Y [Float]
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.Z [Float]
DATA n3.X -> n4.A [String]
DATA n3.Y -> n4.B [String]
DATA n3.Z -> n4.C [String]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.InString [String]
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_PrintVector
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
VAR VectorString: String = ""
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: GetActorLocation
NODE n3: BreakVector
NODE n4: Concatenate
NODE n5: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.X [Float]
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.Y [Float]
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.Z [Float]
DATA n3.X -> n4.A [String]
DATA n3.Y -> n4.B [String]
DATA n3.Z -> n4.C [String]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.InString [String]

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on Tick gets distance to the player pawn and prints Distance: followed by the value.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_DistDebug
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: GetPlayerPawn
NODE n3: GetDistanceTo
NODE n4: Concatenate [A="Distance: "]
NODE n5: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.B [String]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.InString [String]
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_DistanceToPlayer
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
GRAPH: EventGraph
VAR Distance: Float = 0.0
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: GetVar [Variable=Distance]
NODE n3: GetActorLocation
NODE n4: GetPlayerPawn
NODE n5: GetActorLocation
NODE n6: SubtractVector
NODE n7: VectorLength
NODE n8: SetVar [Variable=Distance]
NODE n9: Concatenate [A="Distance: "]
NODE n10: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n8.Execute
EXEC n4.ReturnValue -> n6.A [Vector]
EXEC n5.ReturnValue -> n6.B [Vector]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Execute [Vector]
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.Value [Float]
DATA n2.Value -> n9.B [String]
DATA n8.Value -> n9.C [String]
DATA n9.ReturnValue -> n10.InString [String]>
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_DistanceToPlayer
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
GRAPH: EventGraph
VAR Distance: Float = 0.0
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: GetVar [Variable=Distance]
NODE n3: GetActorLocation
NODE n4: GetPlayerPawn
NODE n5: GetActorLocation
NODE n6: SubtractVector
NODE n7: VectorLength
NODE n8: SetVar [Variable=Distance]
NODE n9: Concatenate [A="Distance: "]
NODE n10: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n8.Execute
EXEC n4.ReturnValue -> n6.A [Vector]
EXEC n5.ReturnValue -> n6.B [Vector]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Execute [Vector]
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.Value [Float]
DATA n2.Value -> n9.B [String]
DATA n8.Value -> n9.C [String]
DATA n9.ReturnValue -> n10.InString [String]>

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on Tick calculates FPS by dividing 1 by DeltaSeconds and prints FPS: followed by the value.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_FPSCounter
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: DivideFloat [A=1.0]
NODE n3: Concatenate [A="FPS: "]
NODE n4: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n1.DeltaSeconds -> n2.B [Float]
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.B [String]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.InString [String]
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_FpsCounter
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
GRAPH: EventGraph
VAR CurrentFps: Float = 0.0
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=CurrentFps]
NODE n3: DivideFloat [B=Delta_SECONDS]
NODE n4: SetText [InString="FPS: "]
NODE n5: AppendText
NODE n6: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.A [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n5.B [String]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.A [String]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.InString [String]
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_FpsCounter
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
GRAPH: EventGraph
VAR CurrentFps: Float = 0.0
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=CurrentFps]
NODE n3: DivideFloat [B=Delta_SECONDS]
NODE n4: SetText [InString="FPS: "]
NODE n5: AppendText
NODE n6: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.A [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n5.B [String]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.A [String]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.InString [String]

instruction: Create a Blueprint that starts a 3-second timer on BeginPlay. Print Timer Started. When it fires print Timer Fired at: followed by game time.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_TimerLog
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="OnTimer", Time=3.0, Looping=false]
NODE n3: PrintString [InString="Timer Started"]
NODE n4: Event_Custom [EventName=OnTimer]
NODE n5: GetGameTimeInSeconds
NODE n6: Concatenate [A="Timer Fired at: "]
NODE n7: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then -> n3.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n7.Execute
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.B [String]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.InString [String]
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_DelayedPrint
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="DelayedPrint", Time=3.0, Looping=false]
NODE n3: PrintString [InString="Timer Started"]
NODE n4: Event_CustomEvent [EventName=DelayedPrint]
NODE n5: GetGameTimeInSeconds
NODE n6: Concatenate [A="Timer Fired at: ", B=Unknown]
NODE n7: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Completed -> n3.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n7.Execute
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.B [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.InString [String]
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_DelayedPrint
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="DelayedPrint", Time=3.0, Looping=false]
NODE n3: PrintString [InString="Timer Started"]
NODE n4: Event_CustomEvent [EventName=DelayedPrint]
NODE n5: GetGameTimeInSeconds
NODE n6: Concatenate [A="Timer Fired at: ", B=Unknown]
NODE n7: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Completed -> n3.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n7.Execute
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.B [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.InString [String]

extra_lines: NODE n6: Concatenate [A="Timer Fired at: ", B=Unknown]
extra_nodes: NODE n6: Concatenate [A="Timer Fired at: ", B=Unknown]

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on overlap casts to Character. If success print Player: followed by display name. If fail print Not a player.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_CastLog
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: GetDisplayName
NODE n4: Concatenate [A="Player: "]
NODE n5: PrintString
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="Not a player"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.AsCharacter -> n3.Target [Actor]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.B [String]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.InString [String]
EXEC n2.CastFailed -> n6.Execute
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_OverlapCheck
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
GRAPH: EventGraph
VAR bIsPlayer: Bool = false
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: Branch
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Player:"]
NODE n5: GetVar [Variable=bDisplayName]
NODE n6: Concatenate [B=" "]
NODE n7: PrintString
NODE n8: PrintString [InString="Not a player"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.AsCharacter -> n5.Target [Actor]
DATA n5.Value -> n6.A [String]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.InString [String]
EXEC n3.True -> n4.Execute
EXEC n3.False -> n8.Execute }
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_OverlapCheck
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
GRAPH: EventGraph
VAR bIsPlayer: Bool = false
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: Branch
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Player:"]
NODE n5: GetVar [Variable=bDisplayName]
NODE n6: Concatenate [B=" "]
NODE n7: PrintString
NODE n8: PrintString [InString="Not a player"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.AsCharacter -> n5.Target [Actor]
DATA n5.Value -> n6.A [String]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.InString [String]
EXEC n3.True -> n4.Execute
EXEC n3.False -> n8.Execute }

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on pressing Fire spawns an actor, gets its location, and prints Spawned at: followed by the location.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SpawnLog
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Fire"]
NODE n2: GetActorLocation
NODE n3: SpawnActorFromClass [ActorClass=BP_Projectile]
NODE n4: GetActorLocation
NODE n5: Concatenate [A="Spawned at: "]
NODE n6: PrintString
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.SpawnTransform [Transform]
EXEC n3.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Target [Actor]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.B [String]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.InString [String]
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SpawnLocationPrinter
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
GRAPH: EventGraph
VAR Location: Vector = (0,0,0)
NODE n1: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Fire"]
NODE n2: GetPlayerPawn
NODE n3: GetActorLocation
NODE n4: SpawnActorFromClass [ActorClass=BP_DemoCharacter]
NODE n5: GetVar [VariableName=Location]
NODE n6: Concatenate [A="Spawned at: "]
NODE n7: PrintString
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n4.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n5.Value [Vector]
DATA n5.Value -> n6.B [String]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.InString [String]

DATA n5.Value -> n6.B [String]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.InString [String]

instruction: Create a Blueprint with bool IsReady. On BeginPlay branch on IsReady. True path prints Path: Ready. False path prints Path: Not Ready.

VAR IsReady: Bool = true
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=IsReady]
NODE n3: Branch
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Path: Ready"]
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Path: Not Ready"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n3.True -> n4.Execute
EXEC n3.False -> n5.Execute

NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Path: Not Ready"]

EXEC n3.True -> n4.Execute
EXEC n3.False -> n5.Execute);

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on AnyDamage prints Took X damage, Health: Y where X is damage amount and Y is remaining health.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_DamageLog
PARENT: Actor
VAR Health: Float = 100.0
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_AnyDamage
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Health]
NODE n3: SubtractFloat
NODE n4: VariableSet [VarName=Health]
NODE n5: Concatenate [A="Took "]
NODE n6: Concatenate [B=" damage"]
NODE n7: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.A [Float]
DATA n1.Damage -> n3.B [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Value [Float]
EXEC n4.Then -> n7.Execute
DATA n1.Damage -> n5.B [String]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.A [String]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.InString [String]
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_DamageReporter
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
GRAPH: EventGraph
VAR CurrentHealth: Float = 100
VAR MaxHealth: Float = 100
NODE n1: Event_AnyDamage
NODE n2: GetVar [Variable=CurrentHealth]
NODE n3: SubtractFloat
NODE n4: ClampFloat [Min=0.0, Max=MaxHealth]
NODE n5: SetVar [Variable=CurrentHealth]
NODE n6: Concatenate [A="Took ", B=DmgAmount, C=" damage, Health: "]
NODE n7: AppendText [B=CurrentHealth]
NODE n8: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.A [Float]
DATA DmgAmount -> n3.B [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Value [Float]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Value [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n6.C [Float]
DATA n5.Value -> n7.B [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n8.InString [String]
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.AppendToFirst [String]);
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_DamageReporter
PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay
GRAPH: EventGraph
VAR CurrentHealth: Float = 100
VAR MaxHealth: Float = 100
NODE n1: Event_AnyDamage
NODE n2: GetVar [Variable=CurrentHealth]
NODE n3: SubtractFloat
NODE n4: ClampFloat [Min=0.0, Max=MaxHealth]
NODE n5: SetVar [Variable=CurrentHealth]
NODE n6: Concatenate [A="Took ", B=DmgAmount, C=" damage, Health: "]
NODE n7: AppendText [B=CurrentHealth]
NODE n8: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.A [Float]
DATA DmgAmount -> n3.B [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Value [Float]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Value [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n6.C [Float]
DATA n5.Value -> n7.B [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n8.InString [String]
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.AppendToFirst [String]);

validation.error:
Line 0: Found 1 parse errors:

extra_lines: NODE n6: Concatenate [A="Took ", B=DmgAmount, C=" damage, Health: "]

instruction: Create a Blueprint with a Gate. When the gate opens print Gate: Open. When it closes print Gate: Closed. On Tick enter the gate, exit prints Active.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_GateDebug
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Open"]
NODE n2: Gate
NODE n3: PrintString [InString="Gate: Open"]
NODE n4: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Close"]
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Gate: Closed"]
NODE n6: Event_Tick
NODE n7: PrintString [InString="Active"]
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n2.Open
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n3.Execute
EXEC n4.Pressed -> n2.Close
EXEC n4.Pressed -> n5.Execute
EXEC n6.Then -> n2.Enter
EXEC n2.Exit -> n7.Execute
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_GateStatus
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: Gate
NODE n3: PrintString [InString="Gate: Open"]
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Gate: Closed"]
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Active"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Enter
EXEC n2.Exit -> n5.Execute
EXEC n2.Opened -> n3.Execute
EXEC n2.Closed -> n4.Execute }
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_GateStatus
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: Gate
NODE n3: PrintString [InString="Gate: Open"]
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Gate: Closed"]
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Active"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Enter
EXEC n2.Exit -> n5.Execute
EXEC n2.Opened -> n3.Execute
EXEC n2.Closed -> n4.Execute }
